product_name: Pacsafe Venturesafe 325 GII Cross-Body Pack - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Sized for an iPad and built to prevent theft during travel, this cross-body pack keeps your important items secure. Wear it on your back as a sling or on the front for extra security.
short_description: Sized for an iPad and built to prevent theft during travel, this cross-body pack keeps your important items secure. Wear it on your back as a sling or on the front for extra security.
